name: Moby
description: We create washing machine filters for homes and businesses to capture and reuse toxic microplastics released from laundry routines. Our circular innovation tackles the most common microplastics, protecting nature, people's health, and frontline communities everywhere.
one_liner: We create washing machine filters for homes and businesses to capture and reuse toxic microplastics released from laundry routines. Our circular innovation tackles the most common microplastics, protecting nature, people's health, and frontline communities everywhere.
location: New York City, New York, United States
